statements: SELECT * FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, date_recorded FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Revenue' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 10000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM financial_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 5000
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY metric_value ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_metrics, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM financial_metrics
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000
SELECT metric_name, timestamp FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM financial_metrics
SELECT analysis_name, analyst_name FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%revenue%'
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 10000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_description, analyst_name FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_metric_value, MIN(metric_value) AS min_metric_value FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value, COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value < 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC;
SELECT data_value, data_date FROM data_mining WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type = 'Upward' ORDER BY analysis_id;
SELECT metric_id, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM financial_metrics GROUP BY metric_id HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT * FROM data_mining WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM data_mining WHERE data_value < 50 AND data_value > 20
SELECT analysis_id, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_date > '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, date, price FROM balance_sheet ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT ticker_symbol, revenue, expenses FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT id, date, equity FROM balance_sheet WHERE equity > assets - liabilities;
SELECT ticker_symbol, liquidity_ratio, profitability_ratio FROM financial_ratios ORDER BY liquidity_ratio DESC, profitability_ratio ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ticker_symbol, revenue, expenses FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY ticker_symbol;
SELECT date, assets, liabilities, equity FROM balance_sheet WHERE date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT ticker_symbol, liquidity_ratio, profitability_ratio FROM financial_ratios WHERE liquidity_ratio > 1 AND profitability_ratio > 0.1;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM financial_data WHERE date = '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
SELECT company_name, revenue, profit FROM financial_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM financial_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT ratio_name, ratio FROM financial_ratios WHERE date = '2022-03-31';
SELECT company_name, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 100000 AND expenses < 50000 ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT company_name, stock_price, date FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT trend_name, description FROM market_trends WHERE date = '2022-05-10'
SELECT industry_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, AVG(expenses) AS avg_expenses FROM industry_metrics GROUP BY industry_name HAVING total_revenue > 500000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT company_name, ratio_name, ratio FROM financial_ratios WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY ratio DESC LIMIT 5
